name: Tower Tribe
description:
If spacebar moves page down after first game load - please reload page.

Controls

- SPACE to play

Instructions

Your world has been invaded by an evil demon Toifel. Your job is to gather your mates from Tower Tribe and defeat the devil with all means necessary.

Description

The game was created for GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours by a team of six.

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021/rate/1084334

The topic of the game jam was Joined Together. 

 We hope you enjoy this short game. Have fun! 

Development team
